Trading Guide
============

This guide covers the trading features of OPSource.

Basic Trading
------------

Learn how to execute basic trading operations:

* Market orders
* Limit orders
* Stop orders

Advanced Trading
--------------

Advanced trading features and strategies:

* Algorithmic trading
* Custom indicators
* Risk management

Best Practices
-------------

* Always use stop-loss orders
* Monitor your positions regularly
* Keep track of your trading history
